00119     // indices are slot(5 or 7), FE, chip, chan.
00120     std::pair<int,int> _ScECALmap[ScECAL_NSLOT][ScECAL_NFE][ScECAL_NCHIP][ScECAL_NCHAN];
00121 
00122     inline std::pair<int,int> getScECALChannelID(int slot, int fe,
00123                                                  int chip, int chan)
00124     {
00125       if (slot!=5&&slot!=7) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00126       if (fe<0||fe>ScECAL_NFE) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00127       if (chip<0||chip>ScECAL_NCHIP) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00128       if (chan<0||chan>ScECAL_NCHAN) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00129 
00130       // FEs not used
00131       if (slot==5&&fe==7) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00132       if (slot==7&&(fe%1==1)) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00133 
00134       return _ScECALmap[(slot==5?0:1)][fe][chip][chan];
00135 
00136     };
00137 
00138     inline ThreeVector_t getChannelPosition(int layer, int strip)
00139     {
00140       if (layer<0||layer>ScECAL_NLAYERS) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00141       if (strip<0||strip>ScECAL_NSTRIPS) throw std::runtime_error("Invalid ScECAL channel.");
00142 
00143       
00144 //111129 Boris found bugs and improved;
00145       layer -=1;
00146       strip -=1;
00147 
00148       ThreeVector_t ret;
00149 #if b111129
00150       cout << "In_ScECALMappingProcessor.hh_strip = " << strip << endl;
00151 #endif 
00152 
00153 //111129      if (layer%2==1) {
00154        if (layer%2==0) {
00155            ret[0] = 10*(0.5+(strip%18)*1-9);//9.5-(strip%18);
00156            ret[1] = -10*((4.5/2.)+(strip/18)*4.5-2*4.5);//(1.5-(strip/18));
00157        }
00158        else {
00159            ret[0] = 10*((4.5/2.)+(strip/18)*4.5-2*4.5); //4.5*(1.5-(strip/18));
00160            ret[1] = 10*(0.5+(strip%18)*1-9);//(strip%18)-9.5;
00161        }
00162 //111129 coterra       ret[2] = 5.04+(layer-1)*8.77+ECAL_START_POSITION;
00163        ret[2] = 5.04+(layer)*8.77; // +ECAL_START_POSITION;
00164 
00165       return ret;
00166 
00167     };
00168 
00169   };
